FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 16-08-2024 11:13:55   (GMT +5:30)
REFERΕNCE NO: 17699883
ATTN CHARTERING DESK
DEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL
MV UNIVERSE KAISA - HDY - OPEN ZHANGJIAGANG , CJK - 24TH- 28TH AUG, 2024
MV. UNIVERSE KAISA
BLT  2004 IMABARI /JAPAN
BUIK CARRIER / LOGGER / CO2 FITTED
DWT 28,388 MT ON 9.778 MTRS (SUMMER)
LOA 169.26 / BEAM 27.2
GRT 16,954 / NRT 10,134
5 HO / 5 HO
GRAIN:37,523 CBM (1,325,110 CBF) / BALE:35,762 CBM (1,262,937 CBF)
CRANES: 4 X 30.5 MTONS
SPEED/CONSUMPTION
BALLAST: ABT 12.5 KNOTS ON ABT 17.0 MT IFO (380CST) + ABT 0.2 MT MGO
LADEN:    ABT 12.0 KNOTS ON ABT 18.0 MT IFO (380CST) + ABT 0.2 MT MGO
IN PORT IDLE: ABT 2.2 MTONS IFO + 0.3 MTONS MGO
IN PORT WORKING: ABT 3.5 MTONS IFO + 1.2 MTONS MGO
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION IS ON BASIS OF THE CONDITION OF MAXIMUM BEAUFORT WIND FORCE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 AND NO ADVERSE CURRENT.
AN UNDERPERFORMANCE CLAIM CAN ONLY BE SUBMITTED IN RESPECT OF PERIODS DURING WHICH THE VESSEL ENCOUNTERS WEATHER UPTO BEAUFORT 4 AND/OR DOUGLAS SEASTATE 3 (SIGNIFICANT WAVE UP TO 1.25 M MAX N SWELL WAVE UP TO 2 M MAX)  AND NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL
SPEED "ABOUT" MEANS 0.5 KNOTS DOWNWARDS AND BUNKER "ABOUT" MEANS 5%, UPWARDS IN CALCULATING OVER-CONSUMPTION BUT NO ALLOWANCE IN FUEL UNDER-CONSUMPTION.ALL SPEED AND CONSUMPTION FIGURES ARE AVERAGE FIGURES DURING C/P PERIOD
VESSELS MAIN ENGINE MAY BURN MDO/MGO AND/OR EXTRA IFO IN CASE OF
EMERGENCY OR HILE NAVIGATING/MANEUVERING IN NARROW/SHALLOW/RESTRICTED
WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS/CANALS, STARTING/STOPPING
THE ENGINE, BALLAST WATER EXCHANGING, CLEANING VESSEL’S HOLDS,
BALLASTING/DEBALLASTING OPERATION, OR BAD/COLD WEATHER CONDITION ETC.
ALWAYS AT THE DISCRETION OF THE MASTER WITH REASONABLE EXCUSE.
ADA
PLSD TO HEAR.
BEST REGARDS,
